Silk Road forums

Discussion => Silk Road discussion => Topic started by: Dread Pirate Roberts on November 12, 2012, 02:15 am

Title: update
Post by: Dread Pirate Roberts on November 12, 2012, 02:15 am
UPDATE (2351 UTC 11/16/2012): Registrations are open again.  Been monitoring the new set up and we are well within capacity, so we are going to open it up again (sorry to everyone left out in the cold the past few days).  Still working out a few bugs, but it looks like we are pretty much back on track folks.  I'll leave this thread pinned for now in case anything comes up in the next few days.  I hope to see all of you at movie night tonight :)  (http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=69283.0)

UPDATE (0225 UTC 11/16/2012): Withdrawals are up to date, so if you sent a withdrawal and it is taking much longer than usual to show up, please contact support so we can investigate.  Still a few things to iron out with the site (people getting logged off, etc), but I think we are just about there.

UPDATE (2326 UTC 11/15/2012): Might not have to take the site down after all.  I'll let you know here if we do.  A side note about withdrawals:  There have been a ton of them (understandable), so we are getting through them as fast as possible.  Please be patient if we haven't gotten to yours yet.

UPDATE (2254 UTC 11/15/2012): The site went down again and there are people claiming to be responsible for it and making threats.  I don't want to take any chances, so the site is going to come down for a bit while we investigate what is going on.  Hopefully this is short lived... what drama!  Next update will come before 0600 UTC.

UPDATE (2355 UTC): Deposits are working.  All outstanding deposits have been processed, and future deposits will be processed as usual.  If you sent a deposit before or during the outage and your account has not been credited, message support so we can investigate your issue.  Some withdrawals have been processed, but there is still a queue we are working through.  I'll update when withdrawals are back to normal.

UPDATE (2052 UTC): Current members now have full access to Silk Road.  Registrations are still closed until we are certain we can handle the additional traffic.  We are still unable to process deposits and withdrawals, but are getting very close.  I will start a new thread with some commentary on this whole situation once we are running 100%.

UPDATE(0850 UTC): Silk Road is available once again, but on a limited basis.  New user registrations are closed for the time being.  Access is limited to vendors only.  New deposits and withdrawals (and any that were sent just before or during the outage) will not be processed until some time in the next 24 hours.  Assuming all goes well, access for all current members will be made available some time in the next 24 hours.

UPDATE (0012 UTC):  Sorry I'm late on this update, won't happen again.  We're pretty much polishing and going down the final check list at this point.  I'm confident we'll make our "matter of days" estimate and this won't be drawn out into week+ territory (assuming nothing goes wrong when we reopen).  When we reopen, access will be limited to vendors only for a few hours so they can mark packages shipped that were sent but not marked before we went down.  Also, auto-finalize and auto-vacation haven't been running since Sunday, and we won't fire those back up for a couple of days after we reopen so everyone can get square first.  Can't wait till this is behind us :)  Next update before 1500 UTC Wednesday.

UPDATE (1113 UTC): I and the team need sleep.  Getting really close now, home stretch (hopefully).  Next update will come before 2300 UTC, Tuesday.

UPDATE (0924 UTC): I know you won't like hearing this, but we aren't quite there yet.  We are working hard and getting closer though.  Next update will come before 1600 UTC.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hello everyone,

I'm alive, I'm safe.  Luck would have it that the first time I'm away for more than 24 hours, the site goes down and I'm the only one that can bring it back up.  As soon as we are sure there haven't been any security breaches and taken all of the necessary precautions, we will get back up and running.  If anyone's orders get messed up because of this (auto-finalizing, etc), we will take full responsibility and make things right, just contact support once we're back up.  I'm terribly sorry for this and all of the recent problems.  I promise it is my top priority to get things running smoothly again.

- -DPR
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.11 (GNU/Linux)

My best estimate tells me we are looking at a matter of days or maybe a day before reopening, not a matter of weeks, but not a matter of hours either.  I hope that helps some of you plan.

I will keep you updated as I am able.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hello everyone,

I'm alive, I'm safe.  Luck would have it that the first time I'm away for more than 24 hours, the site goes down and I'm the only one that can bring it back up.  As soon as we are sure there haven't been any security breaches and taken all of the necessary precautions, we will get back up and running.  If anyone's orders get messed up because of this (auto-finalizing, etc), we will take full responsibility and make things right, just contact support once we're back up.  I'm terribly sorry for this and all of the recent problems.  I promise it is my top priority to get things running smoothly again.

- -DPR

I actually have $2K in there TBH, and let me tell you a secret why millionaire's stay millionaire's, because they're not frivolous with it and they spend other peoples money not their own and the good ones put it all into tax deductible charities like myself.

One year Kerry Packer (Australia's deceased former wealthiest person) paid $84 in tax. One of Australia's most well known gangster cum celebrity types Mick Gatto, operates a "industrial dispute resolution" business that although he drives an E63 AMG (I myself drive an S-Class but a Kompressor 3.5L with the 7sp G-Tronic box because it's not for racing it's a family car) and has holiday houses all over the place, posted an overall loss for the year of something like 27K a couple of years back to not pay tax. Look at Warren Buffet who still lives in the same house he bought a million years ago and yet still wouldn't give his kids anything more than an education of the highest standard. Buffets really nice grand daughter whom he's disowned for her part in a documentary shows how twisted some get by money and what they do with it. My point is this, smart people with money never actually spend money because after a certain point your milking your investments and putting it down to tax. Oh you're having a party, no you're not you're having a "company dinner which just happens to require magicians and "exotic dancers" to win over a prospective investment partner" but nobody there invested after seeing it wasn't viable for their portfolio due to unseen circumstances" lol.

One day I was talking with this drug dealer idiot with bling all over him and was even getting fucking gems in his tooth FFS, (retard rich kid) who was going on about how rich he was and that he never leaves the house without ten grand on his person for "just in case" and I said I'll bet you what you have on you right now that I'm worth more than you and I only have $150 in my wallet "just in case" we'll do this by comparing who has the largest bank account. He said "I have lots of bank accounts" so I said alright how about who has the access to the most cash or credit at a casino right now accessible to us with with what cards we had on us (it felt like playing Pokemon or whatever that Manga card game cartoon is kids watch with him) so off to Crown Jupiters we went since he didn't believe me and I wouldn't show him mine till we got there. He converted his cash to chips and I went and organised the same in value to pretend like I didn't know something he didn't, and went back over to where our friends were hanging out chatting about it as they had all become very interested in our wager, I guess it was one of those who had the biggest cocks in the room type things, then publicly with everyone we went to the floor manager and pulled out our cocks and he had an AMEX Platinum which he thought was the bomb, until I pulled out something very few people have, like a big cock, my AMEX Centurion Card. The Centurion Card is something you have to be invited to get by meeting certain wealth and spending criteria and just to have it costs me money every year for the security of being anywhere in the world and being able to buy a house if I want let alone just get a shit load of gold if the world looks like it's going to get fucked and go into hiding. Needless to say he was fucking ropable about it and I took his chips anyway and sent the money to an organisation I know he hates in his name too and showed him the receipt scan through Facebook, an organisation that supports the Palestinian people (because he's a Jew boy) but Fatah not HAMAS.

So I think you can deduce for yourself it was a figure of speech dude. I'd sooner rather give it to a kid with cancer's family who are eating baked beans every night for dinner to pay for his care than a millionaire criminal who stole it for no reason, which isn't too far from the truth so make of that what you will, the cancer bit I mean. My mate's bills are so bad that he's ordering MDMA to flog off to pay for it. I've offered to give him money but the cunt is too proud to accept charity, it's hard to watch. Mind you their not eating baked beans every night, but they haven't been able to go out to dinner in over a year (except my restaurant when I made them saying it was an invitation with other people to socialize, again because of his pride he says it's not my place to feed) from expenses and with his tax return he hopes to turn it into something decent because of the over inflated price of chems here. I'm not going to act like I earned my wealth, it's generational but I can't help what I was born into, but unlike much of the %1 my heart lies with the Ron Paul rEVOLution, everyone and everything, and I have traveled a lot so therefore have a social conscience plus using psychedelics and going to Burning Man forces me to feel sick when I know the way "they" operate everything.

However unlike in America, in Australia there's a balance of power between us and the Jews, we won't let them control our Fed etc thanks to people who go to schools similar to where I attended (St. Josephs) but I've never seen any of David Icke's lizard people, and if I you knew some of the owners of business and politicians I know you would be surprised that they aren't in fact some form of reptilian creatures because they're cold blooded no doubt. The problem with our system though, is the Jews control our media and therefore keep the people locked in this mentality of a Left/Right paradigm mentality of thinking.

I can tell you %100 from organisations the oldies were and still are members of and therefore dragged me into having involvement with at functions etc that I hate, that the mega rich are all in bed with each other and are about global control for themselves and their, the great grandfather started a mining company and we employ thousands of people now and made the bulk of our money from the smart old cunts prospecting skills and organising capacity to get the shit out of the ground and off to the rest of the world, and instead of paying transport companies to ship it went and started them too and shit just grew and grew. So that's why I said I'm a fair but wealthier than even DPR I'd say but no where near as intelligent or plain brilliant. I have nothing to do with any of "them" and I would do anything I can to establish Libertarianism world wide.

So you don't think we're bankers or something our family built it's wealth out of hard work and caring for employees above all and I stretch that further to say that I will be doing everything I can to support people like the Libertarians world wide and those less fortunate.

Here's two reasons exactly why the War On Drugs is bullshit, three actually, my mate is struggling for medical care because there's not enough state money that could easily pay for these things with war on drug expense/taxes, he's risking his life to save the life of his child and possibly his relationship, and if it's intercepted he won't be there to possibly see his child's small amount of time left. And if that were to occur the cops would paste in on their Facebook page and the Newspaper as a victory while at the same time demonizing an innocent man trying to help his family. Then we have to put up with queer cunts like that iHateNiggers CUNT who goes on about how hard it is for him because he's been locked out from Silk Road as if it's his right to use it at all when it was a gift to the world from DPR. FUCK I need to go and have a cone, but I hope this clarifies my position.

Peace

Quote from: JezuzWazaMushroom on November 12, 2012, 09:32 am
It's no that I can't actually afford to pay back a dirty rotten $1500 dollars, it's that it's the last thing I want to have to do with $1500. $1500 is $1500 and why would I want it going somewhere it shouldn't when it could feed a starving child or something? I actually have $2K in there TBH, and let me tell you a secret why millionaire's stay millionaire's, because they're not frivolous with it and they spend other peoples money not their own and the good ones put it all into tax deductible charities like myself.

One year Kerry Packer (Australia's deceased former wealthiest person) paid $84 in tax. One of Australia's most well known gangster cum celebrity types Mick Gatto, operates a "industrial dispute resolution" business that although he drives an E63 AMG (I myself drive an S-Class but a Kompressor 3.5L with the 7sp G-Tronic box because it's not for racing it's a family car) and has holiday houses all over the place, posted an overall loss for the year of something like 27K a couple of years back to not pay tax. Look at Warren Buffet who still lives in the same house he bought a million years ago and yet still wouldn't give his kids anything more than an education of the highest standard. Buffets really nice grand daughter whom he's disowned for her part in a documentary shows how twisted some get by money and what they do with it. My point is this, smart people with money never actually spend money because after a certain point your milking your investments and putting it down to tax. Oh you're having a party, no you're not you're having a "company dinner which just happens to require magicians and "exotic dancers" to win over a prospective investment partner" but nobody there invested after seeing it wasn't viable for their portfolio due to unseen circumstances" lol.

One day I was talking with this drug dealer idiot with bling all over him and was even getting fucking gems in his tooth FFS, (retard rich kid) who was going on about how rich he was and that he never leaves the house without ten grand on his person for "just in case" and I said I'll bet you what you have on you right now that I'm worth more than you and I only have $150 in my wallet "just in case" we'll do this by comparing who has the largest bank account. He said "I have lots of bank accounts" so I said alright how about who has the access to the most cash or credit at a casino right now accessible to us with with what cards we had on us (it felt like playing Pokemon or whatever that Manga card game cartoon is kids watch with him) so off to Crown Jupiters we went since he didn't believe me and I wouldn't show him mine till we got there. He converted his cash to chips and I went and organised the same in value to pretend like I didn't know something he didn't, and went back over to where our friends were hanging out chatting about it as they had all become very interested in our wager, I guess it was one of those who had the biggest cocks in the room type things, then publicly with everyone we went to the floor manager and pulled out our cocks and he had an AMEX Platinum which he thought was the bomb, until I pulled out something very few people have, like a big cock, my AMEX Centurion Card. The Centurion Card is something you have to be invited to get by meeting certain wealth and spending criteria and just to have it costs me money every year for the security of being anywhere in the world and being able to buy a house if I want let alone just get a shit load of gold if the world looks like it's going to get fucked and go into hiding. Needless to say he was fucking ropable about it and I took his chips anyway and sent the money to an organisation I know he hates in his name too and showed him the receipt scan through Facebook, an organisation that supports the Palestinian people (because he's a Jew boy) but Fatah not HAMAS.

So I think you can deduce for yourself it was a figure of speech dude. I'd sooner rather give it to a kid with cancer's family who are eating baked beans every night for dinner to pay for his care than a millionaire criminal who stole it for no reason, which isn't too far from the truth so make of that what you will, the cancer bit I mean. My mate's bills are so bad that he's ordering MDMA to flog off to pay for it. I've offered to give him money but the cunt is too proud to accept charity, it's hard to watch. Mind you their not eating baked beans every night, but they haven't been able to go out to dinner in over a year (except my restaurant when I made them saying it was an invitation with other people to socialize, again because of his pride he says it's not my place to feed) from expenses and with his tax return he hopes to turn it into something decent because of the over inflated price of chems here. I'm not going to act like I earned my wealth, it's generational but I can't help what I was born into, but unlike much of the %1 my heart lies with the Ron Paul rEVOLution, everyone and everything, and I have traveled a lot so therefore have a social conscience plus using psychedelics and going to Burning Man forces me to feel sick when I know the way "they" operate everything.

However unlike in America, in Australia there's a balance of power between us and the Jews, we won't let them control our Fed etc thanks to people who go to schools similar to where I attended (St. Josephs) but I've never seen any of David Icke's lizard people, and if I you knew some of the owners of business and politicians I know you would be surprised that they aren't in fact some form of reptilian creatures because they're cold blooded no doubt. The problem with our system though, is the Jews control our media and therefore keep the people locked in this mentality of a Left/Right paradigm mentality of thinking.

I can tell you %100 from organisations the oldies were and still are members of and therefore dragged me into having involvement with at functions etc that I hate, that the mega rich are all in bed with each other and are about global control for themselves and their, the great grandfather started a mining company and we employ thousands of people now and made the bulk of our money from the smart old cunts prospecting skills and organising capacity to get the shit out of the ground and off to the rest of the world, and instead of paying transport companies to ship it went and started them too and shit just grew and grew. So that's why I said I'm a fair but wealthier than even DPR I'd say but no where near as intelligent or plain brilliant. I have nothing to do with any of "them" and I would do anything I can to establish Libertarianism world wide.

So you don't think we're bankers or something our family built it's wealth out of hard work and caring for employees above all and I stretch that further to say that I will be doing everything I can to support people like the Libertarians world wide and those less fortunate.

Here's two reasons exactly why the War On Drugs is bullshit, three actually, my mate is struggling for medical care because there's not enough state money that could easily pay for these things with war on drug expense/taxes, he's risking his life to save the life of his child and possibly his relationship, and if it's intercepted he won't be there to possibly see his child's small amount of time left. And if that were to occur the cops would paste in on their Facebook page and the Newspaper as a victory while at the same time demonizing an innocent man trying to help his family. Then we have to put up with queer cunts like that iHateNiggers CUNT who goes on about how hard it is for him because he's been locked out from Silk Road as if it's his right to use it at all when it was a gift to the world from DPR. FUCK I need to go and have a cone, but I hope this clarifies my position.

Peace

gpg: Signature made Sun Nov 11 21:15:12 2012 EST using RSA key ID 67B7FA25
gpg: Good signature from "Silk Road <staff@silkroadmarket.org>"
gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature!
gpg:          There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner.
Primary key fingerprint: 07E2 9C07 DC63 7C8D 1891  2CA7 0222 423B 67B7 FA25

I actually have $2K in there TBH, and let me tell you a secret why millionaire's stay millionaire's, because they're not frivolous with it and they spend other peoples money not their own and the good ones put it all into tax deductible charities like myself.

One year Kerry Packer (Australia's deceased former wealthiest person) paid $84 in tax. One of Australia's most well known gangster cum celebrity types Mick Gatto, operates a "industrial dispute resolution" business that although he drives an E63 AMG (I myself drive an S-Class but a Kompressor 3.5L with the 7sp G-Tronic box because it's not for racing it's a family car) and has holiday houses all over the place, posted an overall loss for the year of something like 27K a couple of years back to not pay tax. Look at Warren Buffet who still lives in the same house he bought a million years ago and yet still wouldn't give his kids anything more than an education of the highest standard. Buffets really nice grand daughter whom he's disowned for her part in a documentary shows how twisted some get by money and what they do with it. My point is this, smart people with money never actually spend money because after a certain point your milking your investments and putting it down to tax. Oh you're having a party, no you're not you're having a "company dinner which just happens to require magicians and "exotic dancers" to win over a prospective investment partner" but nobody there invested after seeing it wasn't viable for their portfolio due to unseen circumstances" lol.

One day I was talking with this drug dealer idiot with bling all over him and was even getting fucking gems in his tooth FFS, (retard rich kid) who was going on about how rich he was and that he never leaves the house without ten grand on his person for "just in case" and I said I'll bet you what you have on you right now that I'm worth more than you and I only have $150 in my wallet "just in case" we'll do this by comparing who has the largest bank account. He said "I have lots of bank accounts" so I said alright how about who has the access to the most cash or credit at a casino right now accessible to us with with what cards we had on us (it felt like playing Pokemon or whatever that Manga card game cartoon is kids watch with him) so off to Crown Jupiters we went since he didn't believe me and I wouldn't show him mine till we got there. He converted his cash to chips and I went and organised the same in value to pretend like I didn't know something he didn't, and went back over to where our friends were hanging out chatting about it as they had all become very interested in our wager, I guess it was one of those who had the biggest cocks in the room type things, then publicly with everyone we went to the floor manager and pulled out our cocks and he had an AMEX Platinum which he thought was the bomb, until I pulled out something very few people have, like a big cock, my AMEX Centurion Card. The Centurion Card is something you have to be invited to get by meeting certain wealth and spending criteria and just to have it costs me money every year for the security of being anywhere in the world and being able to buy a house if I want let alone just get a shit load of gold if the world looks like it's going to get fucked and go into hiding. Needless to say he was fucking ropable about it and I took his chips anyway and sent the money to an organisation I know he hates in his name too and showed him the receipt scan through Facebook, an organisation that supports the Palestinian people (because he's a Jew boy) but Fatah not HAMAS.

So I think you can deduce for yourself it was a figure of speech dude. I'd sooner rather give it to a kid with cancer's family who are eating baked beans every night for dinner to pay for his care than a millionaire criminal who stole it for no reason, which isn't too far from the truth so make of that what you will, the cancer bit I mean. My mate's bills are so bad that he's ordering MDMA to flog off to pay for it. I've offered to give him money but the cunt is too proud to accept charity, it's hard to watch. Mind you their not eating baked beans every night, but they haven't been able to go out to dinner in over a year (except my restaurant when I made them saying it was an invitation with other people to socialize, again because of his pride he says it's not my place to feed) from expenses and with his tax return he hopes to turn it into something decent because of the over inflated price of chems here. I'm not going to act like I earned my wealth, it's generational but I can't help what I was born into, but unlike much of the %1 my heart lies with the Ron Paul rEVOLution, everyone and everything, and I have traveled a lot so therefore have a social conscience plus using psychedelics and going to Burning Man forces me to feel sick when I know the way "they" operate everything.

However unlike in America, in Australia there's a balance of power between us and the Jews, we won't let them control our Fed etc thanks to people who go to schools similar to where I attended (St. Josephs) but I've never seen any of David Icke's lizard people, and if I you knew some of the owners of business and politicians I know you would be surprised that they aren't in fact some form of reptilian creatures because they're cold blooded no doubt. The problem with our system though, is the Jews control our media and therefore keep the people locked in this mentality of a Left/Right paradigm mentality of thinking.

I can tell you %100 from organisations the oldies were and still are members of and therefore dragged me into having involvement with at functions etc that I hate, that the mega rich are all in bed with each other and are about global control for themselves and their, the great grandfather started a mining company and we employ thousands of people now and made the bulk of our money from the smart old cunts prospecting skills and organising capacity to get the shit out of the ground and off to the rest of the world, and instead of paying transport companies to ship it went and started them too and shit just grew and grew. So that's why I said I'm a fair but wealthier than even DPR I'd say but no where near as intelligent or plain brilliant. I have nothing to do with any of "them" and I would do anything I can to establish Libertarianism world wide.

So you don't think we're bankers or something our family built it's wealth out of hard work and caring for employees above all and I stretch that further to say that I will be doing everything I can to support people like the Libertarians world wide and those less fortunate.

Here's two reasons exactly why the War On Drugs is bullshit, three actually, my mate is struggling for medical care because there's not enough state money that could easily pay for these things with war on drug expense/taxes, he's risking his life to save the life of his child and possibly his relationship, and if it's intercepted he won't be there to possibly see his child's small amount of time left. So that's why I said I'm a fair but wealthier than even DPR I'd say but no where near as intelligent or plain brilliant. I have nothing to do with any of "them" and I would do anything I can to establish Libertarianism world wide.

So you don't think we're bankers or something our family built it's wealth out of hard work and caring for employees above all and I stretch that further to say that I will be doing everything I can to support people like the Libertarians world wide and those less fortunate.

Here's two reasons exactly why the War On Drugs is bullshit, three actually, my mate is struggling for medical care because there's not enough state money that could easily pay for these things with war on drug expense/taxes, he's risking his life to save the life of his child and possibly his relationship, and if it's intercepted he won't be there to possibly see his child's small amount of time left. And if that were to occur the cops would paste in on their Facebook page and the Newspaper as a victory while at the same time demonizing an innocent man trying to help his family. Then we have to put up with queer cunts like that iHateNiggers CUNT who goes on about how hard it is for him because he's been locked out from Silk Road as if it's his right to use it at all when it was a gift to the world from DPR. FUCK I need to go and have a cone, but I hope this clarifies my position...

Step away from the keyboard, and GTFO.

Keep digging that hole of lies man. You sound like JohnMtl.

Title: Re: update
Post by: poolsclosed on November 12, 2012, 01:03 pm
Quote from: iHateNiggers on November 12, 2012, 06:42 am
Quote from: poolsclosed on November 12, 2012, 06:36 am
Quote from: iHateNiggers on November 12, 2012, 06:24 am
a "genius" who saw EXPLODING GROWTH and couldn't make the proper adjustments to keep the site operational, keeps us vendors in the dark and our funds in limbo and won't give any concrete answers. I owe him shit.
pop quiz, how do you modify your path environment variable in a POSIX system?

no clue. ask dp rob. he's the genius
trick question! it's different depending on which shell you're using. csh is the de facto UNIX shell but bash is most people's preference. PATH=$PATH:/usr/bin/zsh ; export PATH :)

basic UNIX stuff. it's impossible to use UNIX for anything without knowing what environment variables are and what they do. if you haven't the technical knowledge to know what kind of complex problems can arise from the complex architecture that a website that is constantly serving pages with embedded image data and is constantly tumbling coins and is constantly keeping track of a huge database of orders and is constantly being accessed through TOR which requires a lot of overhead to transmit a webpage, then you end up sounding pretty ignorant and petulant when you complain that a couple nerdy kids would have this place running within a few hours, and what-have-you for other complaints.

Title: Re: update
Post by: sweetone on November 12, 2012, 01:43 pm
Quote from: Dread Pirate Roberts on November 12, 2012, 02:15 am
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hello everyone,

I'm alive, I'm safe.  Luck would have it that the first time I'm away for more than 24 hours, the site goes down and I'm the only one that can bring it back up.  As soon as we are sure there haven't been any security breaches and taken all of the necessary precautions, we will get back up and running.  If anyone's orders get messed up because of this (auto-finalizing, etc), we will take full responsibility and make things right, just contact support once we're back up.  I'm terribly sorry for this and all of the recent problems.  I promise it is my top priority to get things running smoothly again.

- -DPR

Title: Re: update
Post by: goblin on November 12, 2012, 07:29 pm
Quote from: gazwel on November 12, 2012, 07:08 pm
People can see their coins sitting in their wallets though, they have not gone anywhere else. Do you think if some "group" had hacked the site then the BTC would still be there?
Hi, gazwel, would you mind telling me the method by which a person can see their coins in their SR wallets, without logging in to SR which can't be done now? I didn't know there was a way to do this, but please enlighten me, as I am no expert.

Thank you.

goblin
Title: Re: update
Post by: gazwel on November 12, 2012, 07:34 pm
Quote from: goblin on November 12, 2012, 07:29 pm
Quote from: gazwel on November 12, 2012, 07:08 pm
People can see their coins sitting in their wallets though, they have not gone anywhere else. Do you think if some "group" had hacked the site then the BTC would still be there?
Hi, gazwel, would you mind telling me the method by which a person can see their coins in their SR wallets, without logging in to SR which can't be done now? I didn't know there was a way to do this, but please enlighten me, as I am no expert.

Thank you.

goblin

Type your SR wallet address into google, The top hit should be from blockchain.info and it will show you how much is in your wallet.

If you don't know your SR wallet address, then go to your usual wallet and look for the address you sent the amount to in your transactions.

No. Transactions    6

 People can see their coins sitting in their wallets though, they have not gone anywhere else. Do you think if some "group" had hacked the site then the BTC would still be there? They would have a fecking FBI badge there and would waste no time in declaring to the media how great they are.

All you are doing is scaremongering, take your own advice and look at the facts. No one apart from admin has a clue what is happening so declaring you know "facts" when all you are doing is spouting your opinion is helping no one.

I don't think the FBI would announce that they had taken over.  They would wait and get as much info and try to get vendor locations.  They would want to make arrests, not just shut down the site and arrests a bunch of buyers.  Think about what happened with The Farmer's Market.

kitkat82, just to say, it's nothing personal, but stop saying things that hardly can be done on SR:
1. If you stick to encrypting your adres and other sensitive data with PGP, FBI or any other DEA etc. would see trying to decrypt users data meaningless, and if they would be dumb enough to start doing it, probably they would try first with big buyers/vendors, and the start point would be vendors.
2. Other option, as you mentioned on other thread, if they would make arrest with highly rated vendors, they would have to change they PGP keys, and in minutes vendor would write on forum that his account is compromised.

So yes, we can assume that there is some risk, but this risk was there even before maintenance.

Will the site be up today?  I have my doubts but at least someone's working on it.

Title: Re: update
Post by: SelfSovereignty on November 12, 2012, 09:23 pm
Quote from: iHateNiggers on November 12, 2012, 09:17 pm
my sr wallet address also shows a zero balance using that method. WTF
That's not so unusual.  SR has some kind of mixing service, remember.  When that address gets the coins, they actually are owned by whoever has the private key for that public bitcoin address.  Presumably DPR or his team, which must then automate a mixing process by passing the coins on somewhere else.

The coins don't have to be at that address for your account to spend them.  At least I don't see how that would be the case, though I've never seen anyone actually come out and say as much.

Hey everyone,

My best estimate tells me we are looking at a matter of days or maybe a day before reopening, not a matter of weeks, but not a matter of hours either.  I hope that helps some of you plan.

I will keep you updated as I am able.

Title: Re: update
Post by: bingcrosby on November 12, 2012, 09:57 pm
For the conspiracy theorists or those who don't have a copy of DPRs public key offline, here is another message that you can independently verify his recently posted key against.

Obviously I could have just made this and I am the cops with DPRs compromised private key. And I'm also retrospectively editing the original posts that you can also search for on here that have also all been signed with DPRs key. Anyway, I have another one of these offline that was generated when silkroad changed to the new URL if anyone wants yet another way to validate his newest messages are not fraudulent.

This one validates with RSA key id 67B7FA25 on Mon 20 Jun 2011 07:01:31 AM EST
Code: [Select]
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Major announcements will, from now on, be signed using the Silk Road public key that has been on the Silk Road user page (http://ianxz6zefk72ulzz.onion/index.php/silkroad/user/1) since the beginning of the site.  This will allow you to verify that the site wasn't taken over somehow, unless our private key is compromised of course.  We'll occasionally make a signed post on this thread if there are no announcements for a while :)
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v2.0.17 (MingW32)

That don't mean that he doesn't tho.

No in itself hosting a website on the onion is of course not illegal. However given that DPR owns the site he permits what is and isn't allowed to be sold on here (for example, he allows drug but not identities, CC stuff or CP) and also takes a profit from those sales and that is about 5 offenses there on its own.

Title: Re: update
Post by: bingcrosby on November 12, 2012, 10:41 pm
Quote from: SelfSovereignty on November 12, 2012, 10:12 pm
My apologies if I'm coming off as irrational (or if you weren't at all referring to me).  I'm not disputing that whoever made the posts has DPR's private key.  I'm not even trying to say it isn't DPR who made them today.  Not trying to stir up trouble either; please don't interpret it that way.

I just don't understand why he'd use an email address at a domain that wasn't registered until a year and a half after SR was started?  Why not just leave it blank if you didn't intend on putting a usable one in, instead of using one that appears legitimate enough to get some people emailing it?  Is the whois database info not entirely accurate?  Would it show as newly created if somebody accidentally let it lapse and then re-registered it fresh, maybe?

I'm trying to learn, not point fingers.

No it is a valid concern, not irrational. I wouldn't read too much into the email address associated with the gpg key, because anyone can put anything in that field. It would be one of the easiest ways to get information about DPR if he was that stupid to put info that could be associated with him.
My guess would be some spammer/scammer has registered that domain afterwards once seeing his key. I would have probably put obvious garbage in there like you said or at least the onion address of the site. Probably an oversight on his behalf.

The problem we have here is there is no simple way of verifying whether DPRs posted key was valid without SR being online. Luckily like I posted you can check against older copies of messages that were posted here. The difficulty is that you likely don't have copies of those offline and the only copies easily found are on this forum which is also controlled by DPR. I just happened to have 2 messages saved entirely offline from here that I can validate against and as best as you can trust a 2 post screamer they check out.

The true conspiracy theorists would suggest that I'm also DPR. The easiest way to deal with this once this shit all blows over is to make sure DPRs public key is public and stored in places that DPR likely doesn't have control over. Then anyone can verify any of his posts any time they want without relying on people reposting his pubkey here.

Title: We would like an update please
Post by: zumer on November 13, 2012, 12:49 am
Excuse me, but as of yesterday we were told that "you would be very surprised" if the site wasn't up by Monday.
It's now end of Monday, and no follow up today.
There are a lot of people here with significant financial issues being caused by this delay.
When you take on the responsibility of holding thousands of peoples' money in escrow accounts, you are accountable for what is going on.
When your assistant said "monday", we expected either "Monday", or some very frank communication as to what is going on.
There are a lot of people here with blind trust. Me... I've had a bank go under with the manager & assistant buggering off with 30 million in deposits including mine. And the receivers investigated as long as their fees were paid. Once that tap ran dry, they sent out a form letter to depositors saying we were shit out of luck.
So,,, on behalf of a lot of people with money tied up in escrow accounts, we'd like some honest answers.
Right now, the site is a dead link. What does that mean?
I would like nothing more than for a hundred people to criticize me for this post & to be dead wrong.
But when someone gives a commitment, you either meet it, or very clearly explain what is going on.
I understand the nature of this business is built upon secrecy. But it is also built on trust.

My best estimate tells me we are looking at a matter of days or maybe a day before reopening, not a matter of weeks, but not a matter of hours either.  I hope that helps some of you plan.

Post by: quinone on November 13, 2012, 01:38 am
I don't understand why all you hater's expect a play by play update of what they are doing and when they are doing it.

Our enemy (LE organizations across the world) are watching the site and situation closer then most of us. 

For DPR or any admin to come out here and tell us anything hurt's the security of Silk Road.  LE are itching to find a crack in our solid foundation and giving them timestamps of progress and/or info in what went wrong, or how it's being restored is only going to give our enemies the thing they want most, INFORMATION.

I don't know about anyone else but i'd rather wait for SR to return then to find SR has been permanently put down (and other repercussions) by what i'm sure has been a long ongoing large global collaborative effort of the IT personnel of any LE organization in the world that knows about SR to shut it down.

Those of you complaining the most should have learned a very important lesson, don't leave your money in SR, or in the hands of anyone but yourself and your encrypted wallet.dat that you've put on a hidden volume of a USB stick or other various ways of hiding and protecting your wallet.dat.  The exception of course is money you have tied up in SR ...

Yes many vendor's have their money tied up in SR from order's they shipped right before it went down, and
Yes many buyer's are concerned about their order's auto-finalizing or just having not received an order.

We are ALL in this together, all waiting with concern, but god damn it can't you people learn what PATIENCE is?

I'm sorry to have written a completely trolling post, I am just tired of reading page upon page of BITCHING when we should all just calm the fuck down, let the admin's do their job and HOPE and watch out for updates from those people repairing SR who I am grateful for being smart enough to know to keep their mouths shut short of major announcement's.

Having to try to skim through page upon page of trolling posts (like my own, I admit I may not be helping either ... but I am trying) for the important posts from DPR/admin's is not a very good demonstration of the SR community to ... outsider's that we're all mature adult's does it?

There's nothing ANY of us can do other then learn lesson's on how to conduct business on SR in the eventuality of it coming down and WAIT until the site is HOPEFULLY restored, complaining does not help !

I would hope you guys would rather have a top-notch secure system that takes a little longer to go up, then to have some half-ass glitchy mess go up immediately.

Please be patient, we will be back up soon.

An inferior .onion drug distribution site similar to SR except that it has little security, advocates murder (allow's 'hitmen' to put up listings for their ... 'services') and is way more likely to get your ass put in the slammer (unless you are smart enough to know to encrypt everything you say on there).

so wen will the site be back up?and i put 220$ in the day the site went down and i havent had any clue if my money is their?the company  that i use sent the cash tos r and i cant know if its there untill the site is up.and the company i use is laget and they sent thw money and hasnt been returned..i have the recite so i hopre the S R will be honest and make sure we all get whats ares..rufus666

I had transferred money to SR and was about to complete an order before the site went down.   As it is part of good practice in keeping transactions anonymous, I requested a fresh btc address to send that money when I sent it.   That address still has that money unspent according to the block chain.   If  SR were to abscond with the money, it certainly hasn't been moved yet to another wallet.

Title: Re: update
Post by: Dread Pirate Roberts on November 13, 2012, 04:18 am
Hey gang,

We're still getting things set up.  Nothing new to report.  Obviously I can't say much, but we are redeploying the entire system and it is taking lots of time to get all of the data properly backed up and where it needs to be, not to mention thoroughly testing the changes we are making to the system that will hopefully give us enough head room to grow multiple times again.

I'm fully aware that Silk Road isn't your only choice and that my reputation is on the line right now.  We are working on all of these issues in parallel and will be slamming the caffeine until we are up and stable.

Your next update will come no later than 5 am EST.

Cheers,
DPR

PS - I hear everyone's hopes and fears.  This is a stressful time for some of us.  I'm taking this opportunity to find a calm center as the situation whirls around me and I keep pressing forward, calm and clear.  This won't be the most challenging situation I'll face I am sure and it is good practice.  Good luck to each of you as you get through this with me :)

Hey gang,

We're still getting things set up.  Nothing new to report.  Obviously I can't say much, but we are redeploying the entire system and it is taking lots of time to get all of the data properly backed up and where it needs to be, not to mention thoroughly testing the changes we are making to the system that will hopefully give us enough head room to grow multiple times again.

I'm fully aware that Silk Road isn't your only choice and that my reputation is on the line right now.  We are working on all of these issues in parallel and will be slamming the caffeine until we are up and stable.

Your next update will come no later than 5 am EST.

Cheers,
DPR

PS - I hear everyone's hopes and fears.  This is a stressful time for some of us.  I'm taking this opportunity to find a calm center as the situation whirls around me and I keep pressing forward, calm and clear.  This won't be the most challenging situation I'll face I am sure and it is good practice.  Good luck to each of you as you get through this with me :)

i don't quiet see how personal attacks on people voicing their opinion makes one patient and respective? free speech is a funny thing, usually the freedom stops if you're attacking people or inciting others to do so - this is why nazi groups publishing hate propanda are not allowed to do so in many countries with 'free speech'. and before you all start, i'm not calling you nazis, its an example!

I completely agree with this statement.  One cannot say that they treasure free speech when they repeatedly and viciously attack those who have opposing viewpoints.

 When you only want people to speak freely about YOUR opinion and you attempt to censor others through intimidation you are NOT a champion of freedom of speech.  You become an adversary to free speech and you are promoting ignorance by trying to stifle others.  Open your mind my friends.  Do it, even if you can find no reason, just do it for the mental exercise.

This is not directed at anyone in particular,.  I am just thining in general how many have been derogatory and hateful towards those who choose to question authority figures.  Yes the admins would count in this case, and YES you CAN question respectfully and still show gratitude for all they have done!!!  We don't have to sit still and shut our mouths, only saying thank you and please.  We can show respect while questioning what we have been told and discussing with each other what we think may be happening behind the scenes.  We can observe and draw opinions from all the information we have gathered over the past few months or years.  We can have an ADULT discussion while still giving thanks to DPR and all of the admins and Mods.

 It is prudent to consider all possibilities, it is foolish and naive to do nothing.

Quote from: Dread Pirate Roberts on November 13, 2012, 04:18 am
Hey gang,

We're still getting things set up.  Nothing new to report.  Obviously I can't say much, but we are redeploying the entire system and it is taking lots of time to get all of the data properly backed up and where it needs to be, not to mention thoroughly testing the changes we are making to the system that will hopefully give us enough head room to grow multiple times again.

I'm fully aware that Silk Road isn't your only choice and that my reputation is on the line right now.  We are working on all of these issues in parallel and will be slamming the caffeine until we are up and stable.

Your next update will come no later than 5 am EST.

Cheers,
DPR

PS - I hear everyone's hopes and fears.  This is a stressful time for some of us.  I'm taking this opportunity to find a calm center as the situation whirls around me and I keep pressing forward, calm and clear.  This won't be the most challenging situation I'll face I am sure and it is good practice.  Good luck to each of you as you get through this with me :)

whatever the case, i think i gotta go find my local again for some herbs till this is resolved one way or another :/
Title: Re: update
Post by: divinechemicals on November 13, 2012, 06:36 am
I don't know, I hope we're not really the minority here. I think that most people are just sitting back and laughing their ass off at this thread, content with the knowledge that the site will be back soon. Obviously the trolls and whiners are going to make the most noise. I'm just trying to have fun with it while I can. It's like when that Tony scam happened. I mean it really sucked, and even I lost $250 (I learned a valuable lesson about finalizing early that day... luckily a fairly cheap lesson), but watching the Rumor Mill slowly unravel into an incoherent, rambling mess almost made it all worth it. I wouldn't be surprised if somewhere, DPR has a "fuck shit up" button, just so he can laugh his ass off too. "Let's see, I'll turn this #1 vendor into a scammer. Ah yes, that was a good one. Hmm now I'll shut the site down for a week and see what happens. Haha, of course, they turn into animals. How amusing."

Title: Re: update
Post by: jack2324 on November 13, 2012, 07:45 am
Quote from: damaged on November 13, 2012, 06:56 am
The importance of a signature in this context does tend to be overstated. The only thing it proves is that the person who wrote the message is in possession of the private key. That could be LE.

PGP signatures are certainly useful when your adversaries are run of the mill hackers or scammers, but less so when you have state-level adversaries who can confiscate equipment and apply extreme duress.

That being said, I would hope DPR has a system in place (as I'm sure many others here also do) to destroy his keychain if he thinks he's been compromised.  Obviously if it happened fast enough he wouldn't have had a chance to do that, but if I was DPR, I would be a pretty fucking paranoid guy so hopefully that wouldn't happen.

Title: Re: update
Post by: kitkat82 on November 13, 2012, 08:01 am
Quote from: zoedesschaneult on November 13, 2012, 06:13 am
Quote from: kitkat82 on November 13, 2012, 05:49 am
Quote from: shermit on November 13, 2012, 05:01 am
Quote from: JohnGaltson on November 13, 2012, 04:51 am
Hey Shermit,
I'm not out to troll you but I thought about it.
The "worshipers" aren't really worshipers they're also frustrated, yet patient and respective folks who are exercising their own free speech to counter the others.
I think that's how it's supposed to work.  ;)

i don't quiet see how personal attacks on people voicing their opinion makes one patient and respective? free speech is a funny thing, usually the freedom stops if you're attacking people or inciting others to do so - this is why nazi groups publishing hate propanda are not allowed to do so in many countries with 'free speech'. and before you all start, i'm not calling you nazis, its an example!

I completely agree with this statement.  One cannot say that they treasure free speech when they repeatedly and viciously attack those who have opposing viewpoints.

 When you only want people to speak freely about YOUR opinion and you attempt to censor others through intimidation you are NOT a champion of freedom of speech.  You become an adversary to free speech and you are promoting ignorance by trying to stifle others.  Open your mind my friends.  Do it, even if you can find no reason, just do it for the mental exercise.

This is not directed at anyone in particular,.  I am just thining in general how many have been derogatory and hateful towards those who choose to question authority figures.  Yes the admins would count in this case, and YES you CAN question respectfully and still show gratitude for all they have done!!!  We don't have to sit still and shut our mouths, only saying thank you and please.  We can show respect while questioning what we have been told and discussing with each other what we think may be happening behind the scenes.  We can observe and draw opinions from all the information we have gathered over the past few months or years.  We can have an ADULT discussion while still giving thanks to DPR and all of the admins and Mods.

 It is prudent to consider all possibilities, it is foolish and naive to do nothing.

.....ke$ha... is that you?

Yeah right.  I wish.  I would have enough money to buy drugs from the Olsen twins, no need for SR when you have the cell number of the ultimate Hollywood drug dealers.  I love SR and all but it would be cool as hell to buy some pills from the little girls from Full House.

 When you only want people to speak freely about YOUR opinion and you attempt to censor others through intimidation you are NOT a champion of freedom of speech.  You become an adversary to free speech and you are promoting ignorance by trying to stifle others.  Open your mind my friends.  Do it, even if you can find no reason, just do it for the mental exercise.

This is not directed at anyone in particular,.  I am just thining in general how many have been derogatory and hateful towards those who choose to question authority figures.  Yes the admins would count in this case, and YES you CAN question respectfully and still show gratitude for all they have done!!!  We don't have to sit still and shut our mouths, only saying thank you and please.  We can show respect while questioning what we have been told and discussing with each other what we think may be happening behind the scenes.  We can observe and draw opinions from all the information we have gathered over the past few months or years.  We can have an ADULT discussion while still giving thanks to DPR and all of the admins and Mods.

 It is prudent to consider all possibilities, it is foolish and naive to do nothing.

.....ke$ha... is that you?

Yeah right.  I wish.  I would have enough money to buy drugs from the Olsen twins, no need for SR when you have the cell number of the ultimate Hollywood drug dealers.  I love SR and all but it would be cool as hell to buy some pills from the little girls from Full House.

Oh yeah, they are total cokeheads.  They sold him/gave him the Oxycontin and ambien that he was on too.  Poor guy, he was having such a hard time sleeping that he took an insane combination of pills.

Oxycontin
Vicodin
Temazapam
Valium
Xanax
Doxylamine (Unisom)

I can't imagine taking even two benzos together with a small dose of hydrocodone....but 3 benzos with unisom and oxy and hydrocodone?!  I have to wonder if maybe he took the temazapam and forgot that he had taken it since it can cause short term memory loss and kept taking other pills?

Holy shit.  You must have an insane tolerance.  I bet you have withdrawals from hell.  My tolerance was once up to 40mg Oxycodone per day (20 mg 0P 20's 2x a day, sometimes 3) and I tapered off a bit then went cold turkey for a week. I thought I was going to die.  Felt like I was going to have a seizure and I had no balance or coordination. Was also so horribly sick, never have I felt so awful in my life.

What is it like for you when you withdrawls?  That is my biggest fear, having a high tolerance.  I try now to alternate 5 days on oxy) max of 30 mg total a day) with tramadol and neurotin for a week to taper off then back on.

Title: Re: update
Post by: Sc0re on November 13, 2012, 10:46 am
I agree that advance notice would be helpful and very much appreciated, but there's no telling if this, or any other downtime is a planned one. Just because things are being upgraded and debugged etc doesn't mean that they were planned to be at this very moment. Though I agree that communication has been less than optimal especially for the first while, I don't believe we can go and rant about our rights. Even though we're paying for this service, it's illegal everywhere, we have no rights in this matter. People need to realise that they take a risk when they put their money into SR, not just because of scammers but simply because SR doesn't have the backing major companies do so stuff like this happens. The staff are just people like you and me working very hard but it's not exactly like they can call the helpdesk. So let's all just chill and see where things go. DPR isn't unreasonable, he refunded me money I lost due to auto-withdrawal function during the last downtime and that was more than a bit of money. I'm sure we'll find a solution to any and all problems that arise due to this downtime. If we weren't resilient we wouldn't be here to begin with.

Title: Re: update
Post by: SpiceyT on November 13, 2012, 12:05 pm
Quote from: Dread Pirate Roberts on November 12, 2012, 02:15 am
UPDATE (1113 UTC): I and the team need sleep.  Getting really close now, home stretch (hopefully).  Next update will come before 2300 UTC, Tuesday.

UPDATE (0924 UTC): I know you won't like hearing this, but we aren't quite there yet.  We are working hard and getting closer though.  Next update will come before 1600 UTC.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hello everyone,

I'm alive, I'm safe.  Luck would have it that the first time I'm away for more than 24 hours, the site goes down and I'm the only one that can bring it back up.  As soon as we are sure there haven't been any security breaches and taken all of the necessary precautions, we will get back up and running.  If anyone's orders get messed up because of this (auto-finalizing, etc), we will take full responsibility and make things right, just contact support once we're back up.  I'm terribly sorry for this and all of the recent problems.  I promise it is my top priority to get things running smoothly again.

- -DPR

Title: Re: update
Post by: dmtdoodeelsd on November 13, 2012, 12:28 pm
hi all,

i think there seems to be an element of hysteria here - most people don't seem to rememebr what life was like before SR, TBH we have coins stuck in escrow, orders waiting and coins in wallets too - but is it worth losing any sleep over..?! of course its not!!!

is so much more important that the site is back SAFE and RUNNING WELL AND SECURELY rather than being vulnerable to future problems, i for one salute DPR and the team for all the work they have done and fair trade their pioneering system has facilitated...

As for all the people considering the whole thing is a scam and blah blah blah... look how many transactions are taking place each day, and DPR are taking a healthy commision from each of these - realistically the site is worth so much more running than tearing it down and ripping off peoples wallets..?!?! Also hypothetically if they did that , they would be left with thousands of units of digital currency, the value of which would plummet if SR was down permanently - its a no-brainer..!!!


let these guys do what they do, and take their sweet time doing it - the longer they take the better job we can assume they are doing  ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

peace and discordia xxxxx

OP = Original Post

Are you new to the Internet? :D

It's more commonly know as 'Orginal Poster' ...but whatever
It's context based. The OP is made by the OP.

(often Opening Post as opposed to Original Post, but semantics)

Title: Re: update
Post by: Katnip999 on November 13, 2012, 12:54 pm
It is so reasuring to read DPR's words. I keep getting waves of panic when I think about the possibility of SR never returning, I need it for so many reasons. I know it is the same for everyone, loosing this would be really awful.. This has made me realize how important this site is and that I was totally taking it for granted. Thought of it like Ebay and not the risks that are being taken by the staff. Im trying not to get caught up in the drama but when the panic grips me I need to read and talk.

This is my concern, Im sure they are more than aware of this and doing whatever can be done to combat it but if the site came up now suddenly every one will go to it at the same time, then every vendor and buyer will message the support staff to ask them to sort out every single order that was made the couple of days before it went down. The back log will be massive and the amount will grow the longer it is down. I hope they can cope with it.

I agree with the comments made by uniwiz above and many others just chill out a bit and wait to see what happens, Im just here for the reasurance. See it as a holiday from working on SR and try to get all the things you never have time to do, research shit.

Title: Re: update
Post by: quaymo on November 13, 2012, 01:23 pm
Katnip999, nice post that echoes my thoughts about the current situation. I've only traveled the SR for a couple of months but it IS easy to forget what it was like in the "old days". I refer to the past several years with the feds shutting down US based OPs (online pharms), forcing their customers to turn elsewhere which typically involved paying in advance and hoping your goods were eventually shipped and made it through Customs. Reading some of these posts, I'm really thankful any transactions are online and not in person. Reminds me of a favorite quote: “Never argue with a fool, onlookers may not be able to tell the difference” - Mark Twain

Title: Re: update
Post by: dirkdiggler5151 on November 13, 2012, 02:17 pm
Unfortunately guys, I think SR may have finally come to an end.  If I had to speculate, I would guess that LE has infiltrated the site.  I am basing this idea on several assumptions....

1.). Around October 26/27 the price of Bitcoin dropped due to to heavy selling volume.  Also around this same time, one of the biggest bitcoin vendors on SR went offline and stated that he was down due to 'SR problems and network difficulties'.  This vendor continued with this message the week of 11/5 up until the SR outage.
2.). There has been very little communication from the site admins.  I am guessing that there was some type of dead man switch on the site which trashed the server in the event that the admin had been captured.  LE is probably scrambling to rebuild the site right now and put that bogus maintenance screen up to calm everyones fears.

Thoughts?

Tired of Bullshit i hear ya about possible sabutage...but there is nothing to be gained by being angry, i know i am in a similar place. I will be making a trek-hitchhiking the interstate-350 miles one way- as a female to go to the only doc i could find that will prescribe Suboxone w/o private insurance on short notice. Only a few docs here have the special license and i called about 20 yesterday , they either want BIG$$$ like $1100, or more commonly, they have a waiting list for at least 3 mos to over a year, due to limits on how many ppl they can have on at a time. And then ppl wonder why heroin usage goes up, when they change the oxycontin formulation, and restrict prescription pain medicines. I am in pain, and now sick too, have so much to do and i can't...i feel for anyone in this position. If only doctors were really doctors here in BFE, and compassionate...a bunch of moralfags sucking DEA dick. I am just putting this idea out there, i'll proly get more negative karma for doing anything other than cheerio msg. Anyone ever think the pushback against prescribing narcotics could be BigPharma influenced? Because all the narcotics (hydro and oxycodone) are generic now, and they make their big money off proprietary like SUBOXONE! And of course, they're losing the war against weed...so a new bogey man arises. I'm sure there are lots of variables to plug in, but they have to keep the LE prison-industrial complex going - for that's a HUGE lobby/influence group.. And keeps heroin from Afghanistan mkts up for their little war profiteering there as well. Don't just come back with a bunch of hate, i'm tryna think beyond the face of things. And that could be useful in SR being down so long as well. If it's true it's because of LE, nothing we can do anyway there either? Just wondering what ppl think can be done? This withdrawal crap on top of pain might have me on edge so ... and so what can we do to make the sitch better?

This stuff is so fucking sweet. No high, no jitters, no addictive properties. It simply eliminates all tiredness and need to sleep. You are alert, refreshed and even quick witted and sharp tongued. Plus you are a better lover, get more work done, exercise more and better, eat less and are more handsome (okay I exaggerated on only that last one - everything else is true).

Title: Re: update
Post by: Zookala on November 13, 2012, 03:42 pm
Is it a wise decision for LE to take Silk Road down? I mean in one sense it is because obviously there is a huge amount of illegal activity and i expect it is an embarrassment that postmen are now drug mules. But young people aren't hanging round the streets waiting to meet violent dealers who could expose them to even more dangerous drugs such as Meth and Crack. I'm aware you can buy these on the Road too but people also have access to a wealth of safety information about these drugs with a few clicks of the mouse, not unreliable misinformation from peers and pressure to indulge which happens on the streets. Most documentaries and websites would put people right off Meth and Crack. For younger people i think Silk Road is much safer but only if they aren't foolish about what they are buying.

My own personal opinion is that even if Silk Road does come to an end the wheels have already been set in motion and an even more robust alternative will spring up. The service is just too good, not just at providing drugs for recreational use but for people like me who want to obtain things for medicinal use.

On a different subject, would an anonymous market place solely for Cannabis be a good idea or not? The reason i ask is because it has undeniable medicinal value and is gradually becoming more accepted around the world. The advantage would also be that it is extremely safe in comparison to many other substances (meth, heroin, crack etc) so the site would likely not be targeted in such a ruthless manner by LE. It could list items by strain for example and have a wiki with strain information. Anyway it's just a thought as i, like many others, are slightly concerned about the longevity of Silk Road. I hope that DPR will get the issues sorted soon and i'm sure he will.

Title: Re: update
Post by: bincofone on November 13, 2012, 03:45 pm
TiredOfThisBullshit,

There's a bunch of CP accessible through Tor, you don't think interpol would be onto that shit ASAP if it were so easy to bust?

As long as you haven't compromised the entire chain of Tor nodes in a connection, you can't trace IP addresses to SR traffic. You also can't intercept information to find out what information is being sent. Basically your only attack vector on locating the server is bandwidth analysis/sloppy information leaking. Once you have the server all they could gather would be shipping addresses sent to vendors in plaintext, bitcoin addresses of vendors and buyers (which MAY OR MAY NOT be anonymous, depends how careful you are with your coins). I'm sure some people order overseas in large enough quantities for some buyers to be of interest to LE, but you'd hope they were smart enough to use PGP.

PGP encryption can be weak depending on the source of random bits/short key. It's implementation, operating system, and OS version dependent as to whether or not your generated key is as secure as you think it is. If for some reason your key was generated on an embedded device without user input, it's probably shit unless it has a hardware RNG or was created by a really clever coder (any two independent clocks make a hardware RNG).
Title: Re: update
Post by: TheGoodSon on November 13, 2012, 03:47 pm
Quote from: Zookala on November 13, 2012, 03:42 pm
Is it a wise decision for LE to take Silk Road down? I mean in one sense it is because obviously there is a huge amount of illegal activity and i expect it is an embarrassment that postmen are now drug mules. But young people aren't hanging round the streets waiting to meet violent dealers who could expose them to even more dangerous drugs such as Meth and Crack. I'm aware you can buy these on the Road too but people also have access to a wealth of safety information about these drugs with a few clicks of the mouse, not unreliable misinformation from peers and pressure to indulge which happens on the streets. Most documentaries and websites would put people right off Meth and Crack. For younger people i think Silk Road is much safer but only if they aren't foolish about what they are buying.

My own personal opinion is that even if Silk Road does come to an end the wheels have already been set in motion and an even more robust alternative will spring up. The service is just too good, not just at providing drugs for recreational use but for people like me who want to obtain things for medicinal use.

On a different subject, would an anonymous market place solely for Cannabis be a good idea or not? The reason i ask is because it has undeniable medicinal value and is gradually becoming more accepted around the world. The advantage would also be that it is extremely safe in comparison to many other substances (meth, heroin, crack etc) so the site would likely not be targeted in such a ruthless manner by LE. It could list items by strain for example and have a wiki with strain information. Anyway it's just a thought as i, like many others, are slightly concerned about the longevity of Silk Road. I hope that DPR will get the issues sorted soon and i'm sure he will.

There are many issues that LE may have with SR, including but not limited to:

- Easier availability of drugs
- Tax evasion
- Freedom

What you sell is irrelevant, if it's easier/safer to buy it online than from the LE undercover cop, or make some money and move it quietly, of have the freedom to buy whatever you wish, the Globalists will take offense.

I see what you mean yeh. I doubt tax evasion will bother them at this point as it is happening on a colossal scale by people unconnected with Silk Road dealing in person. Hopefully Silk Road will emphasize how futile the war on drugs really is though, That's another important aspect of it i feel - It stands as a symbol for what people want and their personal freedoms. The sooner governments start looking at drug use as a health issue rather than a moral/criminal one the better i think.

Title: Re: update
Post by: SONIAMDISAPPOINT on November 13, 2012, 04:11 pm
Quote from: bincofone on November 13, 2012, 03:45 pm
TiredOfThisBullshit,

There's a bunch of CP accessible through Tor, you don't think interpol would be onto that shit ASAP if it were so easy to bust?

As long as you haven't compromised the entire chain of Tor nodes in a connection, you can't trace IP addresses to SR traffic. You also can't intercept information to find out what information is being sent. Basically your only attack vector on locating the server is bandwidth analysis/sloppy information leaking. Once you have the server all they could gather would be shipping addresses sent to vendors in plaintext, bitcoin addresses of vendors and buyers (which MAY OR MAY NOT be anonymous, depends how careful you are with your coins). I'm sure some people order overseas in large enough quantities for some buyers to be of interest to LE, but you'd hope they were smart enough to use PGP.

PGP encryption can be weak depending on the source of random bits/short key. It's implementation, operating system, and OS version dependent as to whether or not your generated key is as secure as you think it is. If for some reason your key was generated on an embedded device without user input, it's probably shit unless it has a hardware RNG or was created by a really clever coder (any two independent clocks make a hardware RNG).

bullshit argument. some cp tor sites HAVE been taken down by police. It's not easy but possible. One of the options is not try to locate the server from 'outside' but instead hack it in some way and obtain the server ip from 'inside' (hope that makes any sense).

I have to agree with TiredOfThisBullshit on a few points. It is ridiculous and embarrassing for a site as bit as sr to be down for ten motherfucking days. Vendors (and I'm one of them, yes I use a fake account obviously) pay a crapload of fees and commission to use this service. some have thousands of btc stored on sr and not a single explanation is given. Yeah, unless you consider the lame 'too many new users' bullshit as an excuse. No site goes down for ten days {EDIT:}on and off{/} because it can't handle some new users. + it's not like it was totally obvious silk road was getting bigger. DPR should have used the funds to prepare for shit like this waaay in advance.

Then the LE problem. Yes, we can all just wait and tell each other to chill the fuck out but TiredOfThisBullshit has a valid point. SR is simply the biggest drug trading site on the internet and police would do anything to bust its vendors. It would definitely be possible to get at least a lot closer to them. For example, they could stop the btc tumbler in a non-obvious way, trace the bitcoins until they reach an exchange like mt gox and demand the gox user's personal info. They can because mt gox is weak as shit when it comes to handing over private information (and so are most other major exchanges).

I am not saying this is the case, just that you shouldn't just ignore the possibilities. Of all people I expected SR users to at least be a little paranoid. We might forget it because we use this site like ebay but SR is serious shit. We shit on LE's reputation and laugh while doing it. We ship insane amounts of drugs all over the world while customs are just totally oblivious of all the goods that pass them.

To quote a US senator (from the sr wikipedia page):

Quote
It's a certifiable one-stop shop for illegal drugs that represents the most brazen attempt to peddle drugs online that we have ever seen. It's more brazen than anything else by lightyears.

That's us. Don't forget it.

EDIT: To DPR: Don't be an asshole and at 23:00 give us a GOOD explanation.

If a drug buyer doesn't receive the goods he has paid for he deserves an explanation. If we, the vendors, don't get access to our 'product' deserve one too because we are YOUR clients. Right now you only come up with bullshit reports about how hard you're working. We don't give a hit. We want to know WHAT you're actually working on. Because some serious shit needs to be going down for a site not to function for ten days straight.

If at 11 o'clock you're just posting that you're still working very hard, the site's still down and you don't know when it will be finished, i can't take you seriously.

Title: Re: update
Post by: paxpax on November 13, 2012, 04:24 pm
Last couple of posts point to LE as an issue or culprit of the downtime. I do not believe this is the case. The events that have transpired are not indicative of LE infiltration. Other then the possibility massive hardware failure the only remaining issue is hackers.  SR was compromised by hackers most likely after the stored BTC. With out any major blockchain moves they where probably unable to breach SR financial systrm. I am sire they did some damage to the site or stole information as barganing chips. DPR is probably trying to close the security breach and or negotiating with whoever compromised the site.
Title: Re: update

The problem is that no matter the reason we DESERVE the know what the fuck is going on. Hackers, OK, but tell us. LE, ok, tell us, fucked up hardware, how hard is it to just fucking tell.

Like I said earlier: we (vendors) are the clients here and DPR is failing miserably to deliver the product we have paid for (the site) or to at least keep up up to date on its status.

Yes, they are being very vague and the story isn't adding up.

DPR said that it was a surprise in the first post, but on the website it says scheduled maintenance.

There are a few things that I believe could be happening right now:
1) SR was unexpectedly downed and DPR lied about the maintenance being scheduled for some reason.
2) SR is changing or expanding hosts and DPR doesn't want us to know for anonymity and security reasons.
3) SR was taken over by feds and they are in the process of modifying SR to addresses are logged to them. (not too likely, but there is a chance)
4) SR was downed unexpectedly and they are upgrading the security

There are a few things that I believe could be happening right now:
1) SR was unexpectedly downed and DPR lied about the maintenance being scheduled for some reason.
2) SR is changing or expanding hosts and DPR doesn't want us to know for anonymity and security reasons.
3) SR was taken over by feds and they are in the process of modifying SR to addresses are logged to them. (not too likely, but there is a chance)
4) SR was downed unexpectedly and they are upgrading the security

There is option 5 as well (which I hope is not true)
5) DPR pulled off a pirateat40
