Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I HOPE I'M WRONG, I REALLY DO BUT THE SR WE USED TO KNOW WOULDN'T BE WITH HOLDING $2100 of someone's money after contacting them almost instantly then when provided evidence disappear and yet they were still online sending similar messages to other people. I suggest you read the missing BTC threads there's a few, none of which were started by me but I did show some of them how to view the block chain, and one guy actually watched it get moved out before his very eyes the poor bloke, again a 9th or 10th deposit.

You have the hide to abuse me when all I'm doing is making you use your brains, or have you fried those already and critical reasoning and abstract thought are too much for you?

I've been up all night stressed because of these people, taken 40 mg of oxycodone, 20mg diazepam plus weed and I'm still unable to sleep I'm so pissed.

By doing my mate a favour, at this stage now I have to pay him back plus he won't make his money or have his weed for Christmas, and because I won't credit my other account with money because of what's happened and that's still happening to people I'm going local again for some smoko.

In the last two months thee have been about 30 or 40 SR arrests here, one guy killed himself on NBOMe ordered through here by taking too much in a forest and running into trees of all things from hallucinating so hard.

It smells like BACON and furthermore, soon to be broken EGGS!




Why are you still on the forums and why are you still going on about your 150BTC? You called the whole SR team 'c***s' the other day.
Title: Re: update- a few issues that have me a little noided still
Post by: JezuzWazaMushroom on November 17, 2012, 02:38 pm
Quote from: DonnyBerger on November 17, 2012, 02:28 pm
Quote from: JezuzWazaMushroom on November 17, 2012, 02:23 pm
Quote from: ribley on November 17, 2012, 03:09 am
a few things that have me wondering about using the 'new' SR, i do not share any of the fears of DPR & crew scamming, that seems silly, i am however concerned of the LE possibility and feel that there is no such thing as to much paranoia in that case, at least for me
   1- DPR - posted recently apologizing if he sounds different, said changing style to avoid profiling. great if so, good thinking, on other hand, very likely post LE mite post had they compromised DPR and were writing posts themselves
  2- DPR - 'movie nite' post advising all to use torrent link, arrousing security concern with some. i would think DPR would be aware of such concern, or at least post thought on matter. maybe im not understanding something, seems odd.
  3- SR - DPR posting that all good, opening new reg due to can handle it now, but same issues are still there, kicking out when logged in, 3,2,or 1 digi captchas...does not seem fixed, does certainly not seem ready for any more strain w/new members boosting use. if it is a LE situ they would want as many to reg as poss while cat still in bag.
  4- have had 2times prob communicating w/old vendor using their original key. as if they are not being able to decrypt w/original key.
  5- new vendors that have shown up during blackout. this is odd, maybe they were new in the day or two before blackout & i did not see, also seems like many new pics up of product when pics almost never changed before. seems odd so many vends would be on the ball enough to use blackout time to update photos, i dont know, maybe this is paranoid mind playing trix w/me, maybe not. along this line can anyone vouch TranceFamily was on SR pre-blackout? not trying to question this vendor, i could have easily missed seeing before, but i think i would have remember a vendor w/so many colorful pics. please advise if this is unfounded, and apology to TF if so.

  just my wondering, please reply with thoughts. crazy hate reply not needed, wont be read. thank you to others smart enough to know only one to depend on watching u ass is u.


I started a thread two days ago and there were no mods or anything and today about half an hour after posting this my thread was deleted and there was a new statement from "DPR" regarding the site etc.
I have been in discussion with one of the MOD's on here who said he'd been in discussion with DPR daily and is a really good bloke IMO and has calmed my nerves a bit however I'm still locked out of my account and I'm also still out of pocket 150BTC that was never processed into my account although it shows clearly in the block chain then was slowly taken out in strange increments.

Here's what I posted...

Here's what I posted on my thread about half an hour before it was deleted and this magical "DPR" post came along to counter it.

Personally I think they saw us old hats pointing out too many things they didn't like, so I'll do it again and I SERIOUSLY suggest you and others read the whole thing as I know some people have attention spans of as long as it takes to read a TV timetable but it's important information people MUST consider in this place.

from last nights thread that I didn't post before I fell asleep...

You all say this while I've been away having a private chat with a MAJOR VENDOR and he's worried about whether to pull his coins or if he'll even get them, or if he should just try one first and see how long that takes. You guys have no idea, you act like I'm saying this to be a cunt, when it's the fucking opposite you idiots there's people who know shit you don't and you guys don't think of it from all angles. WTF do you think I haven't been banned as you would love so much?

You're like Creationists arguing with an Evolutionist! I'm saying look at the facts and the bigger picture of things, as others have, and you're just going along with "God's Word" like it's gospel, and we all know the fucking bibles a myth of it's infallibility. For the hundredth time, I LOVE SILK ROAD, the REAL SILK ROAD I know without suspect shit and lies, dodgy support, zero addresses. Get off the meth and have a cone or two and really contemplate what's going on here. I WOULD LOVE TO BE WRONG, AND I HOPE I AM, I'm just saying to people be fucking careful. It's obvious if run of the mill hackers and spammers can break into the system, there's nothing stopping the NSA.

I read the book by the team who took out Pablo Escobar, and in the 80's they had a plane that could fly over Medellin, switch his phone on without him knowing and triangulate the position and switch it back off again. In the end they caught him in this manner over 20 years ago.

Imagine what they would have now, in a network they built?

You people to me seem a little bit relaxed about your lives and freedoms and I'm being more concerned for you than you are!

Remember it came out DPR sold the road in August I think it was, two weeks later they had that big upgrade but were obviously competent with the system and knew it in and out.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Rational debates and discussion are what adults have, unless they're religious people, insults are for people with nothing constructive to say!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I HOPE I'M WRONG, I REALLY DO BUT THE SR WE USED TO KNOW WOULDN'T BE WITH HOLDING $2100 of someone's money after contacting them almost instantly then when provided evidence disappear and yet they were still online sending similar messages to other people. I suggest you read the missing BTC threads there's a few, none of which were started by me but I did show some of them how to view the block chain, and one guy actually watched it get moved out before his very eyes the poor bloke, again a 9th or 10th deposit.

You have the hide to abuse me when all I'm doing is making you use your brains, or have you fried those already and critical reasoning and abstract thought are too much for you?

I've been up all night stressed because of these people, taken 40 mg of oxycodone, 20mg diazepam plus weed and I'm still unable to sleep I'm so pissed.

By doing my mate a favour, at this stage now I have to pay him back plus he won't make his money or have his weed for Christmas, and because I won't credit my other account with money because of what's happened and that's still happening to people I'm going local again for some smoko.

In the last two months thee have been about 30 or 40 SR arrests here, one guy killed himself on NBOMe ordered through here by taking too much in a forest and running into trees of all things from hallucinating so hard.

It smells like BACON and furthermore, soon to be broken EGGS!




Why are you still on the forums and why are you still going on about your 150BTC? You called the whole SR team 'c***s' the other day.

First of all Mr Coke Badger, in my country the word cunt has as much weight as fuck and we use it to refer to each other, as in "what a sick cunt" (good) "what a dumb cunt" (dumbass) and "hopeless cunt" (shit cunt)

It's not the offensive thing it is overseas so it may have come across to you, being I assume American since Brits don't care either, and furthermore I don't apologise anyway. I'm out at this stage $2000+ and you think I don't have a right to call someone that has so far scammed me anything I choose?

Go and "badger" someone else and leave the discussion to those without an extra chromosome, and leave Franky Wilde alone too... CUNT!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

First of all Mr Coke Badger, in my country the word cunt has as much weight as fuck and we use it to refer to each other, as in "what a sick cunt" (good) "what a dumb cunt" (dumbass) and "hopeless cunt" (shit cunt)

It's not the offensive thing it is overseas so it may have come across to you, being I assume American since Brits don't care either, and furthermore I don't apologise anyway. I'm out at this stage $2000+ and you think I don't have a right to call someone that has so far scammed me anything I choose?

Go and "badger" someone else and leave the discussion to those without an extra chromosome, and leave Franky Wilde alone too... CUNT!


Well you ment either one of the last 2 and im sure they dont appreciate being called that.
Especaily when you said you were messaging them trying to resolve the issue.
Your clearly just a troll and you should count yourself lucky you can even post on these forums

Okay it's spelled MEANT and ESPECIALLY... your lack of literacy and punctuation skills aside, you don't know who the fuck I was talking to and for the record NO it wasn't microRNA and furthermore said MOD and I get along famously, and yes dickweed I called him a sick cunt and he knew exactly what I meant without having to expand on it.

Why I'm justifying myself to an doss cunt with the coke badger as his avatar who thinks it's a privilege to post on a public forum is beyond me, and in case you can't see that unlike what you say everything I say is balanced and logical and I'm always quick to say that I HOPE I'M WRONG and also you clearly didn't read what I wrote which doesn't surprise me being that you border on the edge of retarded. If you did you would say, as others have, you've raised some very valid points and I hope others read your post in full if only for the consideration.

I don't need to spend my time trying to point out things to brain dead cunts like yourself, I did it so hopefully some people can not end up fucked over or in prison, it's called common courtesy, something your inbred incestuous parents didn't teach you in the trailer park you grew up in!

Seriously, and I mean this with all sincerity, I hope you're the only one on here who does go down in flames and perhaps when you go to prison they'll force you to learn to use your brain because thinking is all you're going to have time to do, and you need practice... lots of it!

So why don't you do yourself a favour and neck up you illiterate cunt you're a parrot!
Title: Re: update- a few issues that have me a little noided still
Post by: DonnyBerger on November 17, 2012, 03:44 pm
Quote from: JezuzWazaMushroom on November 17, 2012, 03:15 pm
Quote from: DonnyBerger on November 17, 2012, 02:55 pm
Quote from: JezuzWazaMushroom on November 17, 2012, 02:38 pm
Quote from: DonnyBerger on November 17, 2012, 02:28 pm
Quote from: JezuzWazaMushroom on November 17, 2012, 02:23 pm
Quote from: ribley on November 17, 2012, 03:09 am
a few things that have me wondering about using the 'new' SR, i do not share any of the fears of DPR & crew scamming, that seems silly, i am however concerned of the LE possibility and feel that there is no such thing as to much paranoia in that case, at least for me
   1- DPR - posted recently apologizing if he sounds different, said changing style to avoid profiling. great if so, good thinking, on other hand, very likely post LE mite post had they compromised DPR and were writing posts themselves
  2- DPR - 'movie nite' post advising all to use torrent link, arrousing security concern with some. i would think DPR would be aware of such concern, or at least post thought on matter. maybe im not understanding something, seems odd.
  3- SR - DPR posting that all good, opening new reg due to can handle it now, but same issues are still there, kicking out when logged in, 3,2,or 1 digi captchas...does not seem fixed, does certainly not seem ready for any more strain w/new members boosting use. if it is a LE situ they would want as many to reg as poss while cat still in bag.
  4- have had 2times prob communicating w/old vendor using their original key. as if they are not being able to decrypt w/original key.
  5- new vendors that have shown up during blackout. this is odd, maybe they were new in the day or two before blackout & i did not see, also seems like many new pics up of product when pics almost never changed before. seems odd so many vends would be on the ball enough to use blackout time to update photos, i dont know, maybe this is paranoid mind playing trix w/me, maybe not. along this line can anyone vouch TranceFamily was on SR pre-blackout? not trying to question this vendor, i could have easily missed seeing before, but i think i would have remember a vendor w/so many colorful pics. please advise if this is unfounded, and apology to TF if so.

  just my wondering, please reply with thoughts. crazy hate reply not needed, wont be read. thank you to others smart enough to know only one to depend on watching u ass is u.


I started a thread two days ago and there were no mods or anything and today about half an hour after posting this my thread was deleted and there was a new statement from "DPR" regarding the site etc.
I have been in discussion with one of the MOD's on here who said he'd been in discussion with DPR daily and is a really good bloke IMO and has calmed my nerves a bit however I'm still locked out of my account and I'm also still out of pocket 150BTC that was never processed into my account although it shows clearly in the block chain then was slowly taken out in strange increments.

Here's what I posted...

Here's what I posted on my thread about half an hour before it was deleted and this magical "DPR" post came along to counter it.

Personally I think they saw us old hats pointing out too many things they didn't like, so I'll do it again and I SERIOUSLY suggest you and others read the whole thing as I know some people have attention spans of as long as it takes to read a TV timetable but it's important information people MUST consider in this place.

from last nights thread that I didn't post before I fell asleep...

You all say this while I've been away having a private chat with a MAJOR VENDOR and he's worried about whether to pull his coins or if he'll even get them, or if he should just try one first and see how long that takes. You guys have no idea, you act like I'm saying this to be a cunt, when it's the fucking opposite you idiots there's people who know shit you don't and you guys don't think of it from all angles. WTF do you think I haven't been banned as you would love so much?

You're like Creationists arguing with an Evolutionist! I'm saying look at the facts and the bigger picture of things, as others have, and you're just going along with "God's Word" like it's gospel, and we all know the fucking bibles a myth of it's infallibility. For the hundredth time, I LOVE SILK ROAD, the REAL SILK ROAD I know without suspect shit and lies, dodgy support, zero addresses. Get off the meth and have a cone or two and really contemplate what's going on here. I WOULD LOVE TO BE WRONG, AND I HOPE I AM, I'm just saying to people be fucking careful. It's obvious if run of the mill hackers and spammers can break into the system, there's nothing stopping the NSA.

I read the book by the team who took out Pablo Escobar, and in the 80's they had a plane that could fly over Medellin, switch his phone on without him knowing and triangulate the position and switch it back off again. In the end they caught him in this manner over 20 years ago.

Imagine what they would have now, in a network they built?

You people to me seem a little bit relaxed about your lives and freedoms and I'm being more concerned for you than you are!

Remember it came out DPR sold the road in August I think it was, two weeks later they had that big upgrade but were obviously competent with the system and knew it in and out.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Rational debates and discussion are what adults have, unless they're religious people, insults are for people with nothing constructive to say!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I HOPE I'M WRONG, I REALLY DO BUT THE SR WE USED TO KNOW WOULDN'T BE WITH HOLDING $2100 of someone's money after contacting them almost instantly then when provided evidence disappear and yet they were still online sending similar messages to other people. I suggest you read the missing BTC threads there's a few, none of which were started by me but I did show some of them how to view the block chain, and one guy actually watched it get moved out before his very eyes the poor bloke, again a 9th or 10th deposit.

You have the hide to abuse me when all I'm doing is making you use your brains, or have you fried those already and critical reasoning and abstract thought are too much for you?

I've been up all night stressed because of these people, taken 40 mg of oxycodone, 20mg diazepam plus weed and I'm still unable to sleep I'm so pissed.

By doing my mate a favour, at this stage now I have to pay him back plus he won't make his money or have his weed for Christmas, and because I won't credit my other account with money because of what's happened and that's still happening to people I'm going local again for some smoko.

In the last two months thee have been about 30 or 40 SR arrests here, one guy killed himself on NBOMe ordered through here by taking too much in a forest and running into trees of all things from hallucinating so hard.

It smells like BACON and furthermore, soon to be broken EGGS!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I'm saying look at the facts and the bigger picture of things, as others have, and you're just going along with "God's Word" like it's gospel, and we all know the fucking bibles a myth of it's infallibility. For the hundredth time, I LOVE SILK ROAD, the REAL SILK ROAD I know without suspect shit and lies, dodgy support, zero addresses. Get off the meth and have a cone or two and really contemplate what's going on here. I WOULD LOVE TO BE WRONG, AND I HOPE I AM, I'm just saying to people be fucking careful. It's obvious if run of the mill hackers and spammers can break into the system, there's nothing stopping the NSA.

I read the book by the team who took out Pablo Escobar, and in the 80's they had a plane that could fly over Medellin, switch his phone on without him knowing and triangulate the position and switch it back off again. In the end they caught him in this manner over 20 years ago.

Imagine what they would have now, in a network they built?

You people to me seem a little bit relaxed about your lives and freedoms and I'm being more concerned for you than you are!

Remember it came out DPR sold the road in August I think it was, two weeks later they had that big upgrade but were obviously competent with the system and knew it in and out.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Rational debates and discussion are what adults have, unless they're religious people, insults are for people with nothing constructive to say!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I HOPE I'M WRONG, I REALLY DO BUT THE SR WE USED TO KNOW WOULDN'T BE WITH HOLDING $2100 of someone's money after contacting them almost instantly then when provided evidence disappear and yet they were still online sending similar messages to other people. I suggest you read the missing BTC threads there's a few, none of which were started by me but I did show some of them how to view the block chain, and one guy actually watched it get moved out before his very eyes the poor bloke, again a 9th or 10th deposit.

You have the hide to abuse me when all I'm doing is making you use your brains, or have you fried those already and critical reasoning and abstract thought are too much for you?

I've been up all night stressed because of these people, taken 40 mg of oxycodone, 20mg diazepam plus weed and I'm still unable to sleep I'm so pissed.

By doing my mate a favour, at this stage now I have to pay him back plus he won't make his money or have his weed for Christmas, and because I won't credit my other account with money because of what's happened and that's still happening to people I'm going local again for some smoko.

In the last two months thee have been about 30 or 40 SR arrests here, one guy killed himself on NBOMe ordered through here by taking too much in a forest and running into trees of all things from hallucinating so hard.

It smells like BACON and furthermore, soon to be broken EGGS!

It's not the offensive thing it is overseas so it may have come across to you, being I assume American since Brits don't care either, and furthermore I don't apologise anyway. Imagine what they would have now, in a network they built?

You people to me seem a little bit relaxed about your lives and freedoms and I'm being more concerned for you than you are!

Remember it came out DPR sold the road in August I think it was, two weeks later they had that big upgrade but were obviously competent with the system and knew it in and out.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I started a thread two days ago and there were no mods or anything and today about half an hour after posting this my thread was deleted and there was a new statement from "DPR" regarding the site etc.
I have been in discussion with one of the MOD's on here who said he'd been in discussion with DPR daily and is a really good bloke IMO and has calmed my nerves a bit however I'm still locked out of my account and I'm also still out of pocket 150BTC that was never processed into my account although it shows clearly in the block chain then was slowly taken out in strange increments.

Here's what I posted...

Here's what I posted on my thread about half an hour before it was deleted and this magical "DPR" post came along to counter it.

Personally I think they saw us old hats pointing out too many things they didn't like, so I'll do it again and I SERIOUSLY suggest you and others read the whole thing as I know some people have attention spans of as long as it takes to read a TV timetable but it's important information people MUST consider in this place.

from last nights thread that I didn't post before I fell asleep...

You all say this while I've been away having a private chat with a MAJOR VENDOR and he's worried about whether to pull his coins or if he'll even get them, or if he should just try one first and see how long that takes. You guys have no idea, you act like I'm saying this to be a cunt, when it's the fucking opposite you idiots there's people who know shit you don't and you guys don't think of it from all angles. WTF do you think I haven't been banned as you would love so much?

You're like Creationists arguing with an Evolutionist! I'm saying look at the facts and the bigger picture of things, as others have, and you're just going along with "God's Word" like it's gospel, and we all know the fucking bibles a myth of it's infallibility. For the hundredth time, I LOVE SILK ROAD, the REAL SILK ROAD I know without suspect shit and lies, dodgy support, zero addresses. Get off the meth and have a cone or two and really contemplate what's going on here. I WOULD LOVE TO BE WRONG, AND I HOPE I AM, I'm just saying to people be fucking careful. It's obvious if run of the mill hackers and spammers can break into the system, there's nothing stopping the NSA.

I read the book by the team who took out Pablo Escobar, and in the 80's they had a plane that could fly over Medellin, switch his phone on without him knowing and triangulate the position and switch it back off again. In the end they caught him in this manner over 20 years ago.

Imagine what they would have now, in a network they built?

You people to me seem a little bit relaxed about your lives and freedoms and I'm being more concerned for you than you are!

Remember it came out DPR sold the road in August I think it was, two weeks later they had that big upgrade but were obviously competent with the system and knew it in and out.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Rational debates and discussion are what adults have, unless they're religious people, insults are for people with nothing constructive to say!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I HOPE I'M WRONG, I REALLY DO BUT THE SR WE USED TO KNOW WOULDN'T BE WITH HOLDING $2100 of someone's money after contacting them almost instantly then when provided evidence disappear and yet they were still online sending similar messages to other people. I suggest you read the missing BTC threads there's a few, none of which were started by me but I did show some of them how to view the block chain, and one guy actually watched it get moved out before his very eyes the poor bloke, again a 9th or 10th deposit.

You have the hide to abuse me when all I'm doing is making you use your brains, or have you fried those already and critical reasoning and abstract thought are too much for you?

I've been up all night stressed because of these people, taken 40 mg of oxycodone, 20mg diazepam plus weed and I'm still unable to sleep I'm so pissed.

By doing my mate a favour, at this stage now I have to pay him back plus he won't make his money or have his weed for Christmas, and because I won't credit my other account with money because of what's happened and that's still happening to people I'm going local again for some smoko.

In the last two months thee have been about 30 or 40 SR arrests here, one guy killed himself on NBOMe ordered through here by taking too much in a forest and running into trees of all things from hallucinating so hard.

It smells like BACON and furthermore, soon to be broken EGGS!

I started a thread two days ago and there were no mods or anything and today about half an hour after posting this my thread was deleted and there was a new statement from "DPR" regarding the site etc.
I have been in discussion with one of the MOD's on here who said he'd been in discussion with DPR daily and is a really good bloke IMO and has calmed my nerves a bit however I'm still locked out of my account and I'm also still out of pocket 150BTC that was never processed into my account although it shows clearly in the block chain then was slowly taken out in strange increments.

Here's what I posted...

Here's what I posted on my thread about half an hour before it was deleted and this magical "DPR" post came along to counter it.

Personally I think they saw us old hats pointing out too many things they didn't like, so I'll do it again and I SERIOUSLY suggest you and others read the whole thing as I know some people have attention spans of as long as it takes to read a TV timetable but it's important information people MUST consider in this place.

from last nights thread that I didn't post before I fell asleep...

You all say this while I've been away having a private chat with a MAJOR VENDOR and he's worried about whether to pull his coins or if he'll even get them, or if he should just try one first and see how long that takes. You guys have no idea, you act like I'm saying this to be a cunt, when it's the fucking opposite you idiots there's people who know shit you don't and you guys don't think of it from all angles. WTF do you think I haven't been banned as you would love so much?

You're like Creationists arguing with an Evolutionist! I'm saying look at the facts and the bigger picture of things, as others have, and you're just going along with "God's Word" like it's gospel, and we all know the fucking bibles a myth of it's infallibility. For the hundredth time, I LOVE SILK ROAD, the REAL SILK ROAD I know without suspect shit and lies, dodgy support, zero addresses. Get off the meth and have a cone or two and really contemplate what's going on here. I WOULD LOVE TO BE WRONG, AND I HOPE I AM, I'm just saying to people be fucking careful. It's obvious if run of the mill hackers and spammers can break into the system, there's nothing stopping the NSA.

I read the book by the team who took out Pablo Escobar, and in the 80's they had a plane that could fly over Medellin, switch his phone on without him knowing and triangulate the position and switch it back off again. In the end they caught him in this manner over 20 years ago.

Imagine what they would have now, in a network they built?

You people to me seem a little bit relaxed about your lives and freedoms and I'm being more concerned for you than you are!

Remember it came out DPR sold the road in August I think it was, two weeks later they had that big upgrade but were obviously competent with the system and knew it in and out.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Rational debates and discussion are what adults have, unless they're religious people, insults are for people with nothing constructive to say!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

Our Prime Minister said on TV recently after Julian Assange revealed how much info governments share, freely admitted they all willy nilly trade info on citizens and they have the power to put a fucking solar powered truck sized buggy thing on Mars, so WTF and who the fuck are SR in comparison? SR had to be compromised sometime IMO!

I HOPE I'M WRONG, I REALLY DO BUT THE SR WE USED TO KNOW WOULDN'T BE WITH HOLDING $2100 of someone's money after contacting them almost instantly then when provided evidence disappear and yet they were still online sending similar messages to other people. I suggest you read the missing BTC threads there's a few, none of which were started by me but I did show some of them how to view the block chain, and one guy actually watched it get moved out before his very eyes the poor bloke, again a 9th or 10th deposit.

You have the hide to abuse me when all I'm doing is making you use your brains, or have you fried those already and critical reasoning and abstract thought are too much for you?

I've been up all night stressed because of these people, taken 40 mg of oxycodone, 20mg diazepam plus weed and I'm still unable to sleep I'm so pissed.

By doing my mate a favour, at this stage now I have to pay him back plus he won't make his money or have his weed for Christmas, and because I won't credit my other account with money because of what's happened and that's still happening to people I'm going local again for some smoko.

In the last two months thee have been about 30 or 40 SR arrests here, one guy killed himself on NBOMe ordered through here by taking too much in a forest and running into trees of all things from hallucinating so hard.

It smells like BACON and furthermore, soon to be broken EGGS!

It's not the offensive thing it is overseas so it may have come across to you, being I assume American since Brits don't care either, and furthermore I don't apologise anyway. I'm out at this stage $2000+ and you think I don't have a right to call someone that has so far scammed me anything I choose?

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him. Also, you say there is no one who knows who he is. no one knows him. *ahem* again, this is not true. There are many who know him on the forums. I will not say who, but if you have been there long enough, you would know. "

Think what you want but if you're in a cell worried about spending the next ten years behind bars remember this, and the Australian Federal Police might not have been lying when they arrested old mate in Melbourne by working on what appears to be some secret SR taskforce they've setup, because Interpol's World Wide Cybercrime Headquaters are in Sydney.

1- DPR - posted recently apologizing if he sounds different, said changing style to avoid profiling. great if so, good thinking, on other hand, very likely post LE mite post had they compromised DPR and were writing posts themselves

Where and when did he say that?

very good question, i read his post & it stuck in my mind it was odd. i read it i think in first day of blackout when i & many others were going back & analyzing. cannot say for sure when as i was reviewing posts of DPR via his thread when i read it, i think maybe originaly posted in sept not positive though....i go back to find in DPRs posts to link here for you to see, do not see it now, but at this point have only made it up through page 7 of post history, it maybe older than i thought, or it may be gone. kind of distressing if it was removed after whoever removed read my post. i am not saying i know, i am not want to cause panic, i am not want hate posts, & i am not want any real SR members in jail. i want people use brains & review, analyze, think. maybe all good, but if not, .....just the possibility makes all effort to confirm or deny valid in my thought. one forum poster makes a thinking post questioning something, another replies w/hate post to draw into duel & obscure thought and question. seem like one that reply w/hate to thought most like LE or other oppressor.
      motives.....who benefits?.....opportunities......changes.......these must be considered by ones with brain left if wish to move toward freedom, let alone avoid jail or worse. even if all turns out good, this must be constant method of being aware, have conscious raised, eyes open, next time maybe not all good????
   this time maybe not all good???

not knowing for sure but many reasons to question...i hope & pray we make it to ultimate goal of freedom.

now i go back to review DPR posts further, hope & pray find & post link here so others verify. frightened of meaning if post really has been deleted.

sympathize with those who are real SR people that dont want to hear this anymore, dont want to see fear. not pleasant for me either.
but if closing eyes to possibility of danger make it go away, we all get blindfolds tonight & be happy ever after.
i love the dream of SR - others with wits &  experience help to make sure it does not turn nightmare.

maybe DPR himself respond to post question? lack of response maybe more meaning than response.

I once saw this book that re-wrote classic books from a 'tweeters' perspective. So here it goes.

Couldn't access SR. Fuck hey, how am I gonna get my drugs.

Tried the forums, apparently its down for everyone. At least everyone is up shit creek.

Saturday 10th:
Still down. Well better start following the forums.

Shit's going down, not sure what.
 
Update released, should be back up by Monday, sweet.

Sunday 11th:
Forums going crazy. Lots of crackheads not getting drugs obviously.

Monday 11th:
No access. Shit balls.

Checked forums, update said tech problems. Should be back soon.

Forums in complete self destruct mode. Conspiracy theory's of DPR true motives arise. 

Tuesday: 12th:
Still no access. Update says next few days.

People are starting to jump ship. Hopefully this will free up the traffic issue

BMR reports coming in. Satying true to SR

Wednesday 13th:
Anytime now. Next 24 hours at least. Pretty keen.

People still having massive panic attacks. Idiots.

Massive conspiracy theory's about security breach and LE posing as DPR

Sick one guys. Flock looses their head and runs rampart. Shows progression of human nature.

Thursday 14th:
SR back up. Things are shaky. People spitting chips about bitcoins not being received.


All in all, a shit fight that is now over.

Title: Re: update
Post by: UltimateSolution on November 22, 2012, 12:33 pm
The thing about recognizing writing patterns is actually a very legitimate concern, anyone with 1000+ posts should be very weary of it. Even if you think you alternate in the way you write there are certain things that can still be compared that you don't even think about. Virtually everything can be analyzed, things like average sentence length, average number of of commas, common word combinations, use of specific vocabulary, common misspellings, there are literally hundreds of things which you would never really think about. For most of us its not really a problem, even for DPR its not a problem unless he has like a very popular blog on the open internet with his real identity, perhaps about internet anonymity, or security or programming. Anything that could connect the identities together. Someone like Limitless however with a shitload of posts (I mean seriously, the guy needs to get a hobby or something) should be very careful. These programs are no joke and its quite frightening what they're capable of. The only limetation (pun intended) is finding something to compare the users on here to, I mean, you can't compare users on here with the whole internet. It's not like the US governments has some sort of super computer that could even do this, and even if they did its not like they don't have more important things to worry about than locking up people who aren't hurting anyone but themselves, oh wait.

Still, be careful guys.

Title: Re: update
Post by: AAfive on November 23, 2012, 09:07 am
Quote from: mark601 on November 23, 2012, 07:51 am
Whats suze my ignorance but wots "black friday' ?
[/quote

No worries buddy:


"Black Friday" is the day after Thanksgiving here in the US (not sure about other countries),  it is the biggest shopping day of the year..  Most stores open up really early (say Best Buy normally opens at 9AM, well they probably open at like 3AM on black friday (today) and they will have a huge sale going on.

Most large stores (Walmart, Best Buy, Target, and so on....) will have HUGE sales on some items.  Normally there will be a PC and/or a large flat screen TV for a HUGE discount, like a 47" flatscreen for 399$ (one of this years sale items) along with many other things. 

THE ONLY PROBLEM is that the stores with the really good deals normally have people waiting in line for hours to get those deals.  And NORMALLY any given store will just have "X" number of the really cheap sale items available. So even though they might just have 10 of them per store you get 100's of people waiting and thinking they are going to get that sales item (needless to sayy after they are gone in 5minutes, everyone kind of goes ape shit)

It is the absolute worst day to go shopping if you are just doing regular shopping, because it gets pretty sketchy in most shops.

Hope this helps, and sorry for the bad punctuation and grammar, I'm still half alseep (thought it was much later when I woke up)
-AA

Title: Re: update
Post by: Razorspyne on December 08, 2012, 04:59 am
Quote from: kissbang on November 16, 2012, 05:29 pm
It's been 70 minutes since the blockchain showed a new block. That is one hell of a delay right there, and it has nothing to do with SR... Normally every 10 minutes...

What, you mean just 1 block, or an entire blockchain? ONE block? No that is not normal. It takes about 10-20 seconds for me for 1, but initial synchronisation took around 70 hours (not minutes) as there were over 100, 000 blocks to synchronise. Alternatively you can get pre-synchronised blockchains but these are not recommended unless your computer is downright epic. To avoid future lag times with your BTC wallet I'd recommend connecting daily when it is fully done, as it has to be synchronised on a pretty much constant basis.

a few things that have me wondering about using the 'new' SR, i do not share any of the fears of DPR & crew scamming, that seems silly, i am however concerned of the LE possibility and feel that there is no such thing as to much paranoia in that case, at least for me

from last nights thread that I didn't post before I fell asleep...

I read the book by the team who took out Pablo Escobar, and in the 80's they had a plane that could fly over Medellin, switch his phone on without him knowing and triangulate the position and switch it back off again. In the end they caught him in this manner over 20 years ago.

This time it's completely different. We remember the OLD DPR, that was who we trusted and it was earned trust, now the DPR thing as far as an almost brand quality thing can't be applied to someone who's done nothing even close to DPR himself and therefore SR isn't the same because DPR WAS SR, and for all we know it could be a gang of people now running it employing outside IT workers to monitor it who don't get it quite yet OR the other gang or gangs, fucking governments of some sort. LEO is my gut feeling because a group interested in keeping the DPR quality up wouldn't be treating people the way they are, and it's not just me.

I'm asking you to take your drug hat off for a minute and put on your rationality one and think long and hard about the shit from all angles.

If you had a consiglierie  and he didn't give you impartial advice like this he wouldn't be doing his job, and I'm actually trying to be a fucking helpful member of the "community" or what's left of it I'm not here to have troll battles!

Here's a quote from a well known vendor on another forum... yes there's more SR ones than this!

“Users of the site worship him.”..this is blatantly false. There are a couple of n00bs that express this type of admiration, but people like myself, who have been on the road for over a year, well…we do not “worship” him. He is just another mod, and he used to be a vendor on the site before it got to big. Now he realises that it would be dangerous for himself to vend, as all LE would have to do is order from him.
